sense.name: Deliver a sermon (as if) in a place of worship.
sense.commentary: Note: Topic of speaking must be something religious or spiritual.
sense.examples: The minister is not preaching this Sunday. Preach, Father, preach! Today I will preach to you about sin.

sense.name: Speak, plead, or argue in favor of something.
sense.examples: The doctor preached a smoking ban in the entire house. Don't preach to me about honor and loyalty! You cheated on your husband! Professors often preach the benefits of their field.
